prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a serpentine body and elegant fins.
Show me a dragon Pokemon that thrives in ocean environments and has a unique blue color.
Imagine a Pokemon that combines aquatic and dragon features with a striking orange underbelly.
Generate a Pokemon that has a calm demeanor, resembles a sea horse, and has blue scales.
Design a winged water Pokemon with a majestic appearance and flowing fins.
Make a Pokemon that looks like a mythical sea creature, featuring shades of blue and white.
Give me a Pokemon that is both elegant and powerful, with distinctive fins and a royal look.
